Context: George Brown College has been named Toronto's best college for the second consecutive year in the NOW Magazine Readersâ€™ Choice poll for 2021. The college offers 164 full-time programs and 180 continuing education certificates/designations. It is located in downtown Toronto and is known for providing hands-on education with real-world learning experiences. The publication, NOW Magazine, has been publishing news, events, and reviews since 1981. For more information, visit the college's website or sign up for updates. George Brown College can be reached at 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559. The email address is ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The college's social media hub can also be visited.
